name: 余琬琴
objective:
本課程乃針對高分子加工過程中，所遇到有關流力之問題，做一綜合性之概述。其主要內容包括：
(1)流體的性質與分類 (2)流體靜力 (3) 伯努力與能量方程式 (4) 管流 (5) Navier-Stokes 方程式
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Fluid properties
3. Fluid statics
4. Flowing fluids and pressure variation
5. Control volume approach and continuity equation
6. Momentum equation
7. The energy equation
8. Dimensional analysis and similitude
9. Flow in conduits
materials:
教科書
Engineering fluid mechanics by Crowe, Elger, Williams, Roberson, 9th ED, Wiley (高立)
參考書
1. Fluid Mechanics, fundamentals and applications. 作者: Y. A. Cengel and J. M. Cimbala, 導讀: 黃振康, McGraw Hill (高立)
2. A brief introduction to fluid mechanics by Young, Munson, Okiishi and Huebsch, 4th ED, Wiley (歐亞)
